review: Perfect for Hulu.Very glad it came with a short HDMI cable because my TV's port is vertical.Two complaints:The micro-USB port should NOT be perpendicular to the device, it should be parallel. It's an awkward design that looks ugly, tangles my wires, and bends the cord. They only put it on the side to distinguish the device from Chromecast.The regular remote is tedious in text searches. I can see why people buy the voice remote.
